content:
The man offered a border guard $ 9000 bribe to travel abroad.

About thisShe reported March 18State Border Service of Ukraine.

According to the department, two men were heading through Shegin's checkpoint.

Border control they were without documents that would give ground for departure.

One of them planned to "solve" this issue by giving a bribe to a law enforcement officer, which he received a refusal.

The briberyman was detained, he was informed by suspicion.

AsArmyInform reported earlier, one of the evidence at the border had three wives, three children and fictitious documents.
title: On the border detained a rich slope
description: This was reported on March 18 by the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to the department, ...
author: Army Inform
